CustomField.description: Firms ranked 1-330 are large. Firms ranked 330-1300 are mid-size. Firms smaller than 1300 are Outside Target.
CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Industry, "Legal")), "Non Law Firm", IF( ISBLANK(Intapp_Master_Ranking__c), "Outside Intapp 900", IF( Intapp_Master_Ranking__c <= 330, "Large Firm (#1-330)", "Mid-size Firm(#331-900)" ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Firms ranked 1-330 are large. Firms ranked 330-1300 are mid-size. Firms smaller than 1300 are Outside Target.
CustomField.label: Large Firm Status
